title: EVO 850 EVO T3 Portable
extract: The SSD 850 Pro is the world's fastest 2.5" SATA SSD, while the SSD 850 Evo is arguably the best value going. ... The T1 was essentially an mSATA 850 Evo stuffed in a sleek enclosure with a SATA to USB 3.0 adapter card. The 850 Evo 500GB boasts read and write speeds of 540 to 520MB/s over SATA 6Gb/s.Feb 23, 2016
extract_html: The SSD 850 Pro is the world's fastest 2.5" SATA SSD, while the SSD 850 Evo is arguably the best value going. ... The 850 Evo 500GB boasts read and write speeds of 540 to 520MB/s over SATA 6Gb/s.Feb 23, 2016
